title: Live Briefing: 11 killed, dozens injured in massive strike on central Beirut
content: The target of the attack on the Basta area was not immediately clear. The Israel Defense Forces did not appear to have posted an evacuation order for that area beforehand.

title: Major explosion rocks central Beirut, leaving huge crater

title: Russia seeks to intimidate Ukraine with new missile, officials say
content: The attack with an intermediate-range ballistic missile has spurred fears of a major escalation in the ongoing war and prompted Ukraine to request new air defenses.

title: Cartel leader who faked own death is arrested in California, officials say
content: Cristian Fernando Gutierrez-Ochoa, alleged son-in-law of “El Mencho,” the leader of the Mexican Cártel de Jalisco Nueva Generación (CJNG), was arrested in Riverside.

title: American businessman makes play for Russian natural gas pipelines
content: An American businessman is seeking to acquire the Swiss company that controls Russia’s Nord Stream 2, according to documents obtained by The Washington Post.
summary: An American businessman is seeking to acquire the Swiss company that controls Russia’s Nord Stream 2, according to documents obtained by The Washington Post.

title: How a change in rice farming unexpectedly made India’s air so much worse
content: No one anticipated that an initiative to save groundwater by delaying the annual rice season would aggravate northern India’s already miserable air pollution.
summary: No one anticipated that an initiative to save groundwater by delaying the annual rice season would aggravate northern India’s already miserable air pollution.

title: ICC warrants put spotlight on Israel and its U.S. defenders

title: Israel and U.S. condemn ICC arrest warrants; other nations vow to enforce
content: The court issued warrants for Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and the former defense minister “for crimes against humanity and war crimes.” It also issued a warrant for a Hamas military leader.
